Author: yomishino
Name: Aether Compass
Description:
This plugin auto detects certain objects/NPCs such as Aether Currents nearby and shows where they are by various ways, such as pointing to their locations on screen and notifying you in Chat.

Currently detects:
	- Aether Currents
	- Mob Hunt Elite Marks
and more on the way.
Punchline: An Aether compass that auto detects nearby Aether Currents --- and more
